overview: Adam is stuck in the mundane existence of 9-5 life in New York City. His days are all the same; anxiety, OCD, depression. Nearing personal collapse, he meets Eva. As she continues to appear in Adam’s life, a new, ethereal world guides him toward self-realization.  Will Adam succumb to the crippling reality he’s been living in, or rise to a free and infinite one?
title: Adam & The Water
